categories: Category:Galactic Empire science and engineering personnel

nodes.text: Doctor Ohran Keldor was an Imperial engineer at the Maw Installation, born in 50 BBY.
Keldor was one of the instructors at Wilhuff Tarkin's orbital training academy above Omwat, and he later employed a hundred Mrlssi. Nasdra Magrody instructed him in AI theory.

He was present when the first Death Star destroyed Alderaan. He later worked with Roganda Ismaren and her son Irek Ismaren in order to bring the Eye of Palpatine to Belsavis in order to use it against the New Republic, he died when he fell off of a loader on Belsavis chasing after Leia Organa Solo.
